title: AWS
text: IAM, VPC, EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, CloudWatch, CloudFront, Route 53, Amazon Connect, Bedrock (intro).

title: Dev & Ops
text: Python, Flask, Docker, GitHub Actions, Terraform (foundations), Linux, Networking (VLANs, Wi-Fi APs).

title: Support & Tooling
text: Customer support, Jira, ITSM principles, troubleshooting, documentation.
